meanings.definition: A type of plant with small black berries.
meanings.sent1: The inkberries grew in the garden next to the roses.
meanings.sent2: I picked some fresh inkberries to make a jam.
meanings.sent3: The inkberries played hide and seek with the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as dark as inkberries on a moonless night.
meanings.sent5: The inkberries looked like tiny drops of darkness against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The berries of the inkberry plant.
meanings.sent1: The inkberries were ripe and ready to be harvested.
meanings.sent2: She used the inkberries to dye fabric a deep shade of black.
meanings.sent3: The inkberries giggled as they rolled off the table.
meanings.sent4: His words were like inkberries staining her heart.
meanings.sent5: The inkberries tasted bitter but left a sweet memory on her tongue.
